(:action purify ; Purify a resource and prepare it for use
  :parameters (?resource - entity ?c - container ?tool - tool)
  :precondition (and
    (unprocessed ?resource)
    (available ?c)
    (has_tool ?tool)
  )
  :effect (and
    (processed ?c)
    (not (unprocessed ?resource))

(:action boil ; Boil a container's contents and update its status
    :parameters (?c - container)
    :precondition (and
      (purified ?c)
      (not (boiled ?c))
    )
    :effect (and
      (boiled ?c)
      (not (purified ?c))

(:action gather ; Gather a resource and integrate it into a collection
    :parameters (?resource - entity ?collection - collection)
    :precondition (and
      (gatherable ?resource)
      (not (in_collection ?resource ?collection))
    )
    :effect (and
      (in_collection ?resource ?collection)
    )

(:action build ; Build or assemble a resource
    :parameters (?entity - resource ?state - state)
    :precondition (and
        (not (complete ?entity))
        (requires_action ?entity ?state)
    )
    :effect (and
        (complete ?entity)
        (not (requires_action ?entity ?state))
